description: When you purchase a glamping tent, you can enjoy all the benefits of being part of a community. These benefits include attending events, participating in activities, accessing facilities, and much more.
Eco Beach Village will provide you with all the necessary resources and supplies to make your life easier and more comfortable. No need to worry about day-to-day tasks in this eco-city.
Enjoy a lower cost of living compared to the United Kingdom and get a higher return on your income by investing in Eco Beach Village.
Sumba is conveniently located just a one-hour flight away from Bali, and other popular destinations in the region, making it easily accessible for travellers.
By renting a motorcycle, you can easily navigate and explore the entire island from the north to south, for as little as £25 per month.
One of Indonesia’s largest e-commerce companies, Tokopedia offers a reliable delivery service, where your orders arrive on your doorstep within 2 to 3 days.
